channel.title: InrestructX 718/742 | Dungeoneering | Construction | Nice Community
channel.description:
[center][img]http://s23.postimg.org/jtu2rwqsr/Inrestruct_X.gif[/img]
[img]http://custom-zombies.com/Forums/Themes/Greenlungs_Theme/images/home.png[/img][url=http://inrestructx.com/]Home[/url] [img]http://forums.groundspeak.com/GC/public/style_images/geocaching/comment_new.png[/img][url=http://inrestructx.com/index.php?/index]Forums[/url] [img]http://en22.tribalwars.net/graphic//unit/att.png?1[/img][url=http://inrestructx.com/webclient.html]Play now[/url] [img]https://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/nuvola2/16x16/apps/download_manager.png[/img][url=http://inrestructx.com/Launcher.jar]Download now[/url]
[size=6]Why us?[/size]
InrestructX has flawlessly been up for good two months now. We have been trying to fulfill all our players requests as soon as possible. Our goal is to create a server that would keep players busy & interested at all times. Our server isn't very easy, nor is it very difficult. Our 8GB Dedicated Server VPS makes sure the server remains online at all times!
[size=6]Features[/size]
-60-floor dungeoneering system with small, medium and large rooms. -Construction system with every room and object except dungeons working. -Every skill works nicely. -A vast variety of powerful items - Drygores, Sirenic, Malevolent, Tectonic, Sea singer, Tetsu, Death lotus & much more! -Updates occuring every day! -All drops have been rewritten to keep them perfect and steady. -A nice variety of bosses - Vorago, Bork, Nex, Nomad, Qbd & many more. -Master capes with nice particles. -Loads of minigames - Rise of the six, Grotworms, Clan wars & many others. -Nice skilling experience rates. They're not too easy, nor too difficult. -Highscores. -Voting. -Trivia system. -Loyalty system. -Cosmetic outfits. -Achievement rewards.
[size=6]Screenshots[/size]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/10pzzgm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/30cpuf4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/vrdlhi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2s63fad.jpg[/img] [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-Y4avjqdIwrI/VNkD6CBW2kI/AAAAAAAAABI/BNJUjnWfX3U/w1044-h538-no/Construction.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-7TvWesfnzWg/VNkEFdYlSoI/AAAAAAAAABQ/3KRwTLDIFQg/w1044-h538-no/Agility.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-66RDdOoboxI/VNkD5yQY-xI/AAAAAAAAABE/T5QmAoBdbkU/w1044-h538-no/Corporeal%2Bbeast.png[/img] [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-_mzYSsJmzsc/VNkEnpo748I/AAAAAAAAABY/K7517PaQzaE/w1044-h536-no/Dominion%2Btower.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-xtnPpWnp9tE/VNkFkhnmzFI/AAAAAAAAABk/vlWZk2Vy61s/w1044-h536-no/Fishing.png[/img] [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-Oi0-myK1gx8/VNkGFTUty4I/AAAAAAAAABw/m1dkODlFg5I/w1044-h538-no/Kalphite%2Bqueen.png[/img] [img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-IgWnJzCC9aQ/VNkHmd7TniI/AAAAAAAAACA/3nXABPYA9Fg/w1044-h538-no/Nex.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-XziytsZvKww/VNkH_XL2beI/AAAAAAAAACI/H0K-gxOcTQU/w1044-h538-no/Revenants.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-5yjS2Pdb-qk/VNkIqjm-FzI/AAAAAAAAACQ/-NI1KXHj_r4/w1044-h539-no/Runespan.png[/img] [img]https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-wFS0k_ihG4s/VNkJLj1lnmI/AAAAAAAAACY/2KgrnVgg-p0/w1044-h538-no/Slayer%2Btower.png[/img] [img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-kogEupe2QBk/VNkJWI-FpXI/AAAAAAAAACg/uS7J4ftH15o/w1044-h535-no/Tormented%2Bdemons.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: InrestructX 718/742 | Dungeoneering | Construction | Nice Community
item.dc:creator: @InrestructX718 InrestructX718
item.description:
@InrestructX718 wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:4, topic:550432”]Looking very good man!
I’m sure i will try this server out some time, and give some feedback.

The media you provided is quite exciting, mainly dungeoneering with actual rooms.
And of course Construction which seems to be close to original.
Very nice job, and i wish you the best of luck with reaching a decent playerbase.[/quote]

Thanks man, I hope your feedback will be positive

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Looking very good man!
I’m sure i will try this server out some time, and give some feedback.

The media you provided is quite exciting, mainly dungeoneering with actual rooms.
And of course Construction which seems to be close to original.
Very nice job, and i wish you the best of luck with reaching a decent playerbase.

[size=6]Why us?[/size]

InrestructX has flawlessly been up for good two months now. We have been trying to fulfill all our players requests as soon as possible. Our goal is to create a server that would keep players busy & interested at all times. Our server isn’t very easy, nor is it very difficult. [size=6]Features[/size]

-60-floor dungeoneering system with small, medium and large rooms.

-Every skill works nicely.
